description: This Dart file defines a Flutter screen widget for displaying assigned deliveries in a delivery app. It includes UI components such as app bar, header, placeholder lists, and uses custom themes and permission checks.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: StatelessWidget representing the assigned deliveries screen for delivery personnel.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Widget displaying the header section with user queue info.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Widget representing a stylized row with an icon and text, used for placeholders.

methods.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen.build
methods.description: Builds the main scaffold, including app bar, authorization check, and body content.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the header UI with gradient background, avatar, and title.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Builds a stylized placeholder row with icon and text.
